Class.name: EasyCSP.Validator.Validators.Alpha
Class.Description:
Pass in a string value, a dynamic array, or a Cache list structure. A true or false (1 or 0) will be returned in a dynamic array (or list) for each value in the input structure. If the input value is a list then every element in it must pass the test. If even one element does not then the return will be FALSE (0). TRUE is returned for each element if that element consists only of the characters [A-Z,a-z]

Parameter.name: message
Parameter.Default: The value must be alphabetic only.

Method.name: run
Method.Implementation:
if $data(inputValue) = 0 then return @false if $get(inputValue) = "" then return @false
if $listValid(inputValue) then inputValue = $listToString(inputValue, @am) end
numberOfValuesToTest = dCount(inputValue, @am)
truth = @true for idx = 1 to numberOfValuesToTest if (inputValue<idx> <> oConv(inputValue<idx>,"MCA")) then truth = @false exit end Next
return truth
